title: Admin Assistant with Accounts Experience
job_overview:
We are looking for a detail-oriented and reliable Admin Assistant to support a busy plumbing and property maintenance company. The main focus of this role will be rewriting and preparing clear, client invoices based on job details provided by field staff. You’ll help ensure each invoice is accurate, grammatically sound and professional before it’s sent to the client by the owner of the company.


Responsibilities:
Review job notes submitted by tradespeople and rewrite them in clear, professional English
Generate and prepare client-ready invoices in ServiceM8
Insert relevant labour and material details into each invoice
Work closely with the business owner to confirm any pricing or material costs
Ensure all invoices are completed daily and reflect the work accurately
Maintain records of completed invoices and flag any inconsistencies
Provide occasional admin support as required
 
Requirements:
Excellent written English and grammar skills
Strong attention to detail and ability to make sense of jargon-heavy job descriptions
Highly organised and efficient with time
Able to take direction well and work independently
Comfortable handling repetitive tasks with accuracy and consistency
Experience using ServiceM8 or similar trade-based job systems is an advantage
Previous experience in admin, invoicing or accounts is preferred




Software to Be Used:
ServiceM8
Gmail
Google Workspace
 
Timezone: AEST
 
Working Hours: 4 hours per day / 20 hours per week
